pname: CBSE All In One English Core Class 12
pdescription: It helps students practice the concepts using hundreds of practice questions of all types.

pname: Wren And Martin -high School English Grammar
pdescription: Widely used reference books on English Grammar. It gives detailed information about the language.
By solving as many questions from it regularly one can attempt any question coming in exams.
The book provides complete theory with Illustrations (real-life Images) along with fully solved Exercises in 2 levels.
Class 12 Chemistry teaches about organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry. It builds the base of applied science.
This book contains solutions to NCERT Textbook questions has been designed for the students studying in Class XI.
